author: dr:ez.no
msg: - Removed the need for HTTP-like constants for controller results that can not
have a view applied to them (such as redirects).
- Implemented the 'ezcMvcResultUnauthorized' class that can be used by actions
to signal the dispatcher that something should happen instead of a view

author: dr:ez.no
msg: - Added support for parsing http basic auth data from a HTTP request.

author: dr:ez.no
msg: - Implemented a simple basic method for converting action names into method

author: kn:ez.no
msg: - Fixed generation of RST tables in docbook conversion

author: kn:ez.no
msg: # A valid table currently does not validate. Parser test case added. Will be
